name: Phlogiston Desk Lamp: Sufficiently Weighty
description: This intricately designed desk lamp is made from high-quality metal materials, which gives it excellent durability, but also significantly more weight than ordinary table lamps. However, such lamps typically don't need to be moved or transported frequently, so their weight is generally not considered a drawback. Moreover, for some residents of Natlan, the weight of an item is also seen as a symbol of its solid construction. In fact, some people even go out of their way to weigh lamps when choosing one...
